title: Elegant Cannes French Riviera Escape with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Pool with Panoramic Views
description:
Experience the best of the French Riviera with a stay at this elegant retreat near Cannes' iconic Croisette promenade. Effortlessly blending timeless beauty with modern luxury, this property echoes a Mediterranean ambience - from the coastal-inspired furnishings to the leafy olive trees and blossoming gardens that ensconce the facade.

Dine on refined French cuisine at the on-site restaurant, relax with a treatment at the indulgent spa or wind up to the rooftop and take in panoramic views as you soak into the jacuzzi. When it’s time to explore, stroll along the palm-fringed esplanade, stop by world-class restaurants and haute couture boutiques or sink your toes into golden sands as you watch superyachts sail past.
location_description: Hôtel La Bastide de l'Oliveraie & Spa

title: Elegant French Riviera Escape in Residential Quarter of Cannes
description:
Experience the best of the French Riviera with a charming stay at La Bastide de l’Oliveraie - an elegant residential retreat a short stroll from Cannes iconic Croisette promenade and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor.

Effortlessly blending timeless beauty with modern luxuries, this beautiful property echoes a Mediterranean ambience - from the coastal-inspired furnishings to the leafy olive trees and blossoming gardens that ensconce the facade. Dine on refined French cuisine at the on-site restaurant, relax with a soothing treatment at the indulgent spa, or wind up to the rooftop and take in gorgeous panoramic views as you soak into the bubbly jacuzzi. When it's time to explore, stroll along the palm-fringed esplanade - stopping by world-class restaurants and haute couture boutiques - or sink your toes into the golden sands as you watch superyachts sail past.

title: Five-Star Cannes Opulence on the Famous La Croisette with Five Restaurants & Bars
description: Discover unparalleled and dazzling elegance along the famed La Croisette at Carlton Cannes, a Regent Hotel. Be captivated by breathtaking views of the French Riviera, whether lounging on a daybed at the Carlton Beach Club or savouring moments on the terrace at Riviera Restaurant. Taste Anatolian excellence at Rüya, sip a personalised concoction by expert mixologists at Bar 58, and surrender to pure relaxation by the poolside or under the skilful care of aestheticians at the spa.
offer_address: 58 Boulevard de la Croisette, Cannes, 06400 Cannes, France

title: Boutique Cannes Elegance Overlooking the French Riviera with Beachfront Dining
description:
Indulge in the enchanting allure of the French Riviera with a stay at Mondrian Cannes, a haven of luxury nestled in the heart Cannes. Just a few steps from the legendary Boulevard de La Croisette, this elegant retreat blends modern elegance with timeless Riviera charm.

Savor modern, Asian-inspired cuisine at Mr. Nakamoto Cannes, or indulge in blissful dining at Hyde Beach Cannes, where golden sands meet the glistening sea. Whether you’re wandering through the iconic Palais des Festivals, home to the world-renowned Cannes Film Festival, strolling through the vibrant Marché Forville, or basking in the warmth of the golden beaches, you’ll be swept away by Cannes' timeless charm.
offer_address: 45 Boulevard de la Croisette, Cannes 06400, France
